mapper.insert: insert into prob_info(title, difficulty, time_limit, space_limit, description, create_person, update_person) values (#{title}, #{difficulty}, #{timeLimit}, #{spaceLimit}, #{description}, #{createPerson}, #{updatePerson});
mapper.update:
update prob_info
title = #{title},
difficulty = #{difficulty},
time_limit = #{timeLimit},
space_limit = #{spaceLimit},
description = #{description},
update_person = #{updatePerson},
is_delete = #{isDelete}
where id = #{id};
mapper.select: select p.id, p.title, p.difficulty, p.submit_cnt, p.accept_cnt, p.time_limit, p.space_limit, p.description, u1.name as create_person, p.create_date, u2.name as update_person, p.update_date, t.id as tag_id, t.name as tag_name from prob_info p left join user_info u1 on p.create_person = u1.id left join user_info u2 on p.update_person = u2.id left join pro_tag pt on p.id = pt.pro_id left join tag_info t on pt.tag_id = t.id where p.id = #{id};
